member.name: IWICBitmapSourceTransform.DoesSupportTransform
member.summary: Determines whether a specific transform option is supported natively by the implementation of the interface.
member.param: The to check if they are supported.
A pointer that receives a value specifying whether the transform option is supported.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSourceTransform.GetClosestPixelFormat
member.summary: Retrieves the closest pixel format to which the implementation of can natively copy pixels, given a desired format.
member.param: A pointer that receives the GUID of the pixel format that is the closest supported pixel format of the desired format.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSourceTransform.GetClosestSize
member.summary: Returns the closest dimensions the implementation can natively scale to given the desired dimensions.
member.param: The desired width. A pointer that receives the closest supported width.
The desired height. A pointer that receives the closest supported height.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSourceTransform
member.summary: Exposes methods for offloading certain operations to the underlying implementation.
